scenario_description: At Autoline Manufacturing, a recent increase in customer complaints about vehicle finish quality has prompted the quality assurance team to seek improvements. The team, led by automotive engineer Priya, decides to implement an AI-powered computer vision system to detect surface defects on car panels. Priya must now determine how to integrate the AI's real-time feedback into the existing inspection workflow, ensuring that the AI enhances, rather than replaces, the nuanced judgments of experienced human inspectors.
